\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 72305}

\subsection*{Dream Time}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Alex}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 28 oz & oral & Various & tea\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 135.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Sip Sip Sip



This is not the thing to have a good time, but rather like most reports state, just tastes bitter as fuck. It does however create a wonderful high that can make me fall asleep better and longer than any ambien I've taken. Maybe the day we start learning about these herbs is a day to enjoy.
